bio: Coindaocap Represent Web3 Communities From The Globe And Building Decentralized Social Media On Optimism
contributionDescription: attract more web3 users towards optimism ecosystem into the defi swap, nfts ,governance voting , engaging on social medias to build a mass community for optimism projects my contribution will always we impactful for the whole op ecosystem thank you for supporting small projects

contributionLinks.description: Where we engage with web3 communities

impactDescription: Regular Voting on all proposal because voting is important to make wise decision and better for the ecosystem thats what we do we we encourage them to participate in every event on optimism whether it's voting,new project launch we also arrage hackathons to keep optimism network secure

pwRecategorizeReason: NO, the application should be categorized as "PROJECT" because it refers to collective actions, a website, and a user community, rather than individual actions or needs.
